sentences.en: Any other ways I can sweeten the offer for you, Bob?
sentences.cn: 除了副总统的位置我还能再回报你什么 吗 ?

sentences.en: Children sweeten labors ; but they make misfortune more bitter.
sentences.cn: 子女使 辛劳 变为甜蜜,使不幸更加苦涩.

sentences.en: Children sweeten labors; but they make misfortunes more bitter.
sentences.cn: 子女使他们的劳苦变甜, 但也使他们的不幸更苦.

sentences.en: I'll sweeten her up a bit by inviting her to the party.
sentences.cn: 我要邀请她参加聚会好让她随和一些.

sentences.en: If you sweeten him up he'll do the work for you.
sentences.cn: 你要是哄哄他,他就会帮你干活.

sentences.en: Is there any way to sweeten up his grouchy disposition?
sentences.cn: 有什么办法能让他不满的情绪变成愉快 呢 ?

sentences.en: It exists merely to sweeten the taste buds after a hearty meal.
sentences.cn: 它的存在仅仅是为了在用过丰盛的饭菜之后让味蕾溢发香甜之感.

sentences.en: She had been careful to sweeten the deal with a rather generous cash payment.
sentences.cn: 她一直甚为审慎，想要通过支付大量现金促成这笔交易。

sentences.en: Sweeten dishes sparingly with honey, or con-centrated apple or pear juice.
sentences.cn: 加一点蜂蜜或浓缩苹果汁或梨汁，让菜带点甜味。

sentences.en: Sweeten the mixture with a little honey.
The Australians fry their bananas and sweeten them with honey.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚人把香蕉炸了，然后再淋上蜂蜜吃。

sentences.en: The pears will sweeten as they ripen.
The small courtesies sweeten life; the greater ennoble it.
sentences.cn: 有点礼貌使生活愉快, 多点礼貌使生活高尚.

sentences.en: The very thought of these things was sufficient to sweeten any bitterness, and heal any wound.
sentences.cn: 正是他对这些事物的思念,足以使任何苦痛变甜, 足以医好任何创伤.

sentences.en: We need to sweeten up this tea.

words.tran_cn: 甜的；悦耳的；芳香的；亲切的；n. 糖果；乐趣；芳香；宝贝；（俚）酷毙了
有点甜的；过甜的；有点可爱的
甜美地；温柔地；惬意地；讨人喜欢地
减轻；使变甜；使温和；使悦耳

trans.tran_en: to make something sweeter, or become sweeter

trans.tran_cn: 使甜，把…弄香，使温和，使愉快，使悦耳
